text: Futhi ningathembi (umuntu) ngaphandle kwalabo abalandela inkolo yenu ithi ngempela ukuholwa (ngokuyikho) ukuholwa nguMvelinqangi (ngakube) anikholwa ukuthi omunye engemukela okufanayo nenakwemukela noma baphikisane nani ngaphambili kweNkosi yenu, ithi ngempela umusa usesandleni sikaMvelinqangi uwunikeza lowo amthandayo futhi uMvelinqangi ungamele konke uyazi
